page.title: 13A Day in the Life of Alan
page.content: I am nine years old and I was born on January 15 1976 in Bushey, Herts. I get up at 7.30 am and get washed and dressed. I usually like to wear long trousers, unless it's very hot. I have my breakfast at 7.45am and I usually have toast. Then I watch breakfast television. I find the news very interesting. After combing my hair I put on my coat and go to school. My dad takes me in his car. It is a Nissan Prairie, a Japanese car and the rear doors are sliding ones which are a bit unusual. When I get to school I put my things in my place in the cloakroom. I like writing my news and doing maths. the best. I like doing maths. because you have to use your brain and find the answer in the end. I also like working with the computer. When playtime comes I like to play with my friends.
